aka: L'odyssée d'un trésor : l'or de Troie
宝藏的旅程：特洛伊宝藏
this_title: The Odyssey of a Treasure: Priam's Gold
trans_title: 宝藏的旅程：普里阿摩斯金子的旅程
L'odyssée d'un trésor : l'or de Troie
宝藏的旅程：特洛伊宝藏
introduction: From the plains of the Troade, to the cellars of a Nazi bunker, to the dark basements of Moscow's largest museum. With Homer and in the footsteps of the extremely wealthy businessman Heinrich Schliemann, we follow the true odyssey of the Treasure of Priam which spans over more than 3 millennia.Producer: AB ProductionsDirector: Vivien Floris & Gokce OzerBroadcasters: Toute l'Histoire, RMC Découverte, RSI
chinese_title: 宝藏的旅程：普里阿摩斯金子的旅程
foreign_title: The Odyssey of a Treasure: Priam's Gold
